Footer.tagline: Restoring Enterprise sovereignty through autonomous, AI-governed cloud modernization.
Footer.footerText: Governed, Global, and Generative infrastructure for sovereign organizations.

Hero.title: Restoring Sovereignty
Hero.subtitle: The G-Framework empowers global enterprises to automate multi-cloud infrastructure with zero-trust governance.

Capabilities.title: Core Sovereign Products
Capabilities.subtitle: Six modular pillars designed to solve the complexity of global multi-cloud governance.

SovereignGallery.title: The Sovereign Visual Library
SovereignGallery.subtitle: Detailed architectural captures of the G-Framework in production.

control.title: Autonomous Control Plane
control.description: The Command Center (Image A) provides a real-time 4K visualization of all global cloud assets. Image B showcases the 'Drift Remediation' engine in action, where an unauthorized configuration change was automatically reverted in 1.4 seconds.

failover.title: Multi-Cloud Circuit Breaker
failover.description: Image A captures the global latency map just before a regional provider failure. In Image B, you can see the G-Framework triggering an instantaneous workload migration to Oracle OCI to maintain 100% uptime.

hero.title: Enterprise Sovereign Stack
hero.subtitle: A modular suite of 4K-visible orchestration tools designed to restore total control, resilience, and compliance to your distributed multi-cloud.

playground.title: Sovereign Playground
playground.description: The world's first IDE designed specifically for cross-cloud sovereign orchestration. Prototype complex infrastructure intents across OCI, AWS, and Azure in a unified environment.
playground.explanation: The primary workspace (Image A) displays syntax highlighting for G-Framework DSL, while the secondary monitor (Image B) provides a live diff across three cloud providers.

workflows.title: G-Workflows
workflows.description: A drag-and-drop visual engine for defining multi-step automation. G-Workflows handles state synchronization and edge cases automatically for regional failovers.
workflows.explanation: In our workflow designer (Image A), engineers map out logic. Image B captures the G-Workflows engine executing a non-disruptive migration.

guard.title: Governance Guard
guard.description: Continuous, automated auditing for highly regulated enterprise environments. Scans every resource against SOC2, GDPR, and national sovereignty mandates.
guard.explanation: Image A demonstrates the 'Compliance Map' overview. Image B shows the automated remediation log where a misconfigured bucket was automatically locked.

knowledge.title: Sovereign Knowledge
knowledge.description: A secure Knowledge base and RAG engine that operates within your sovereign boundary. Process sensitive legal and regulatory data with AI without cross-border leaks.
knowledge.explanation: The Knowledge Map (Image A) visualizes data clusters within national nodes. Image B shows the RAG-assisted legal drafting interface.

deploy.title: Obsidian Deploy
deploy.description: The deployment engine for mission-critical apps. Guarantees atomic changes across global clusters with 100% rollback reliability.
deploy.explanation: Image A displays the deployment pipeline status. Image B shows the atomic rollback verification screen during a simulated partial failure.

nexus.title: Cross-Cloud Nexus
nexus.description: Unified telemetry and cost management across all clouds. Nexus intelligently routes workloads to the most cost-effective sovereign node in real-time.
nexus.explanation: Image A tracks cost arbitrage opportunities globally. Image B shows the cross-cloud unified telemetry dashboard.

cta.title: Ready for a Private Briefing?
cta.subtitle: Experience the full technical capability of the G-Framework with our engineering team.

hero.title: Strategic Sovereign Solutions
hero.subtitle: The G-Framework delivers measurable velocity across regulated industries: Governance, Global Sovereignty, and Generative Infrastructure.

financial.title: Global Finance Modernization
financial.description: Eliminate legacy technical debt by automating the refactoring of monolithic mainframes to microservices. Secure, compliant, and instantaneous across 32 sovereign regions.
financial.explanation: Image A captures high-frequency trading latency. Image B displays automated 'Ledger Sync', ensuring zero data loss during regional outages.

healthcare.title: Sovereign Health Data
healthcare.description: Accelerate R&D cycles while guaranteeing HIPAA compliance across distributed cloud environments. Train AI models on localized patient data securely.
healthcare.explanation: In Image A, we see telemetry from IoMT devices. Image B showcases the 'Sovereign Knowledge' RAG engine processing patient records.

government.title: Public Sector Digital Trust
government.description: Build citizen trust with FIPS-validated infrastructure. Zero-egress architectures for classified workloads and sovereign identity management.
government.explanation: Image A demonstrates 'Cyber Range' simulations. Image B displays citizen identity flows processed within national boundaries.

hero.title: Global Impact Hub
hero.subtitle: Scholarly articles, engineering breakthroughs, and industry analysis on the frontier of digital sovereignty.

aso.title: Autonomous Sovereign Orchestration (ASO)
aso.excerpt: A formal framework for AI-driven cloud-agnostic governance. Establishing the mathematical proof for State Synchronization Convergence (SSC) across 1,000+ nodes.
aso.author: OmniGCloud Research

prompt.title: Prompt Engineering for Sovereign Infrastructure Control
prompt.excerpt: How to use Natural Language to orchestrate complex Kubernetes clusters. A guide to our 'Declarative Intent' engine.
prompt.author: AI Ops Team

latency.title: Cloud Provider Latency: 2025 Comprehensive Benchmark
latency.excerpt: Evaluating OCI, AWS, and Azure on global ingress performance. Why Oracle's ARM Ampere nodes are winning for sovereign workloads.
latency.author: Research Lab

rag.title: Securing Regulatory Data with Sovereign Knowledge
rag.excerpt: A deep dive into Retrieval Augmented Generation within air-gapped environments. How to maintain 100% privacy for legal docs.
rag.author: Security Architect

bench.title: Comparing LLM Performance for Infra-Code Generation
bench.excerpt: GPT-4o vs Claude 3.5 Sonnet vs Llama 3 for generating sovereign Terraform manifests. Which one yields fewer drift errors?
bench.author: AI Research

newsletter.title: Join the Sovereign Research Circle
newsletter.subtitle: Weekly insights on distributed systems, data privacy, and the future of global infrastructure.

hero.title: Plans tailored for Sovereign Scaling
hero.subtitle: Predictable pricing for enterprise orchestrators. Secure your digital sovereignty with the world's most resilient multi-cloud framework.

trust.title: Enterprise-Grade Compliance
trust.subtitle: All plans include the security architecture required for highly regulated sectors.

residency.title: Data Residency
residency.desc: Keep your data within legal boundaries. Total control over placement.

neutrality.title: Cloud Neutrality
neutrality.desc: No vendor lock-in. Move workloads between clouds at the touch of a button.

scholarly.title: EB-1A Scholarly Ops
scholarly.desc: Implementation follows peer-reviewed ASO architectural patterns.

q1.a: A real-time compliance check that evaluates your cloud infrastructure against specific governance policies (GDPR, ISO, etc.).

q2.q: Can I switch clouds mid-billing cycle?
q2.a: Yes. The G-Framework allows near-instant migration with no additional platform fees.

q3.q: Do you offer discounts for Open Source projects?
q3.a: Highly encouraged. Reach out to our community team for a zero-cost Developer+ plan.

cta.title: Scale with Sovereign Certainty
cta.subtitle: Ready to deploy the G-Framework across your global infrastructure?

developer.name: Developer
developer.desc: For individual engineers building the future of sovereign infra.

professional.name: Professional
professional.desc: For scaling teams requiring multi-region resilience.

sovereign.name: Sovereign
sovereign.desc: Tailored infrastructure for nations and Fortune 500s.

hero.title: OmniGCloud Autonomous Platform
hero.subtitle: The primary control plane for Global Governance and Agentic Cloud Modernization.

core.title: Sovereign Core
core.desc: Zero-latency residency with separated control planes.

comparison.title: The Sovereign Advantage
comparison.subtitle: How the G-Framework differs from legacy cloud management proxies.
comparison.footer: * Analysis based on 2025 Autonomous Sovereign Orchestration (ASO) Architectural Standards.

arbitrage.title: Financial Arbitrage & Cloud Neutrality
arbitrage.subtitle: The G-Framework doesn't just manage your cloud—it optimizes the economy of your infrastructure. Automatically shift workloads to the most cost-effective sovereign node in real-time.
arbitrage.forecastDesc: Our EAB-Forecast engine analyzes global pricing indices across OCI, AWS, and Azure to predict your 12-month burn rate with 99.8% accuracy.
arbitrage.switchDesc: Experience real-time workload migration. When a provider increases rates or violates compliance, the G-Framework executes an autonomous re-home.
arbitrage.lockinDesc: Maintain 100% portability of your data and logic state across borders.
arbitrage.portabilityDesc: Migrate production workloads in seconds without code changes.
arbitrage.eb1aDesc: "The EABF (Economic Arbitrage & Billing Forecast) algorithm represents a significant advancement in the field of Distributed Economics. By decoupling resource cost from provider APIs, the petitioner has established a new standard for Cloud-Agnostic Financial Governance."
